title: Jesus Appears to the Disciples and Peter
summary: Summary for John 21. This chapter highlights the divine nature of Jesus, His miraculous signs, and His call to believe.

faq.question: What is a key message in John 21?
faq.answer: Jesus is the Son of God who brings eternal life to those who believe.

faq.question: What does John 21 teach about Jesus?
faq.answer: It emphasizes His divinity, compassion, and redemptive mission.
